sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SHAWPOOR, a town of Hindustan, province of Gund- waneh, situated on the Rhair, a considerable river, which runs by the south side of the town, over a bed of rock, which impedes its navigation. It is a straggling town, with a small fort built of rubble-stone and mud. Long. 83. 23. E. Lat. 23. 34. N.
